name: Author Stats
author: Don Kukral

sections.description:
Displays various metrics for a selected author

sections.installation:
Copy “author-stats” folder to your WordPress Plugins Directory.
Activate plugin via WordPress settings.
sections.faq:
What roles are considered authors?

administrator, editor or contributor
sections.changelog:
1.2

Verified compatability with WP 4.0

1.2

Upgraded jquery-ui to 1.10 and verified compat with WP 3.9.1

1.1.3

Fixed reference to _GET[‘page’] without key check

1.1.2

Fixing hosed up directory structure in repo

1.1.1

Changed capabilities to administrator only

1.1

Fixed average word count logic.

1.0

Initial version
